Query.name: DBWriter Performance
Query.description: Shows the performance of the dbwriter. Contains three performance indicator: - lines_per_seconds (number of processed lines of the reporting file per second) - derived_value_time (needed time for calculating the derived values in seconds) - deletion_time (needed time for executing the deletion rules in seconds)
Query.sql: select time_end, variable, num_value from view_statistic where name = 'dbwriter';
